Detailed Description

Data for formulas. This class represents the high level definition of Physics formulas. It provides methods to help calculate and monitor the motion of an flying object.

Author:
Krasimir Baylov(61080), Stanislav Petrov(61055)
Version:
1.0

void userInfo.Calculator.setAngle ( double  val  ) 

Setter for angle. A value in degrees is set but internally it is presented in radians for easier calculations Values between 0 and 90 degrees are accepted.

Parameters:
val The value of the angle in degrees
